text: The 1984–85 FIS Cross-Country World Cup was the 4th official World Cup season in cross-country skiing for men and ladies. The World Cup began in Cogne, Italy on 9 December 1984 and finished in Oslo, Norway on 17 March 1985. Gunde Svan of Sweden won the overall men's cup, and Anette Bøe of Norway won the women's. ==Calendar== ===Men=== {| bgcolor="#f7f8ff" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 90%;
